0.1.name: wordpress/metro-style-social-widget
0.1.description:
A light weight wordpress widget that displays Metro Style social network icons in Sidebar and links to your social network profiles.

Add button option will display the Like / Follow button on the Social icons so that your users can immediately Like / Follow your page or profile without leaving your site.

Since every one use Facebook, Google+ , Twitter and RSS, we made them as default and other network as optional.

If needed you can display Linkedin, Youtube and Pinterest else choose don't show option in widget settings.

Next Release will Include the Below Feature

  • User side configuration / customization in Widget admin page
  • More Styles

Support / Contact

  • More Info / DEMO
  • Develop
